item.title: 迪士尼与 DirecTV 解决合同纠纷，重启 ESPN 和 ABC
item.description: 迪斯尼公司与 DirecTV 达成了一项新合同，允许这家娱乐巨头恢复数百万用户对 ESPN 和 ABC 等频道的访问。【原文：Walt Disney Co. and DirecTV reached a new contract that lets the entertainment giant restore access to channels such as ESPN and ABC for millions of customers.】

item.title: 特朗普只能眼睁睁看着自己的媒体股份暴跌 40 亿美元
item.description: 前总统唐纳德-特朗普通过将一家新兴媒体初创公司上市而积累的纸面财富正在萎缩，而一场最快将于 9 月 19 日开始的出局竞赛可能会让这笔财富缩水更多。【原文：The paper fortune that former President Donald Trump amassed by taking a nascent media startup public is shriveling, and a race to the exits that begins as soon as Sept. 19 could shrink it even more.】

item.title: 纳格尔称通胀率将达到 2% 的目标，但欧洲央行必须保持专注
item.description: 德国央行行长约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，即使消费价格增长有望在明年年底前放缓至2%，欧洲央行决策者也必须保持警惕。【原文：European Central Bank policymakers must remain on alert even with consumer-price growth on track to slow to 2% by the end of next year, Bundesbank President Joachim Nagel said.】

item.title: 博士伦与高盛合作探讨出售事宜：金融时报
item.description: 据《金融时报》周六报道，博士伦公司正与高盛集团的顾问合作，测试可能买家的兴趣。【原文：Bausch + Lomb is working with advisers from Goldman Sachs to test interest from possible buyers, the Financial Times reported on Saturday.】

item.title: 尼日利亚与丹格特公司就汽油分销达成协议
item.description: 尼日利亚已与丹格特炼油厂达成协议，通过该协议，尼日利亚国有能源公司将成为该厂汽油的唯一分销商。【原文：Nigeria has reached an agreement with the Dangote Refinery through which the country’s state-owned energy firm will be the sole distributor of gasoline from the plant.】

item.title: 据 Il Sole 报道，新日铁可能竞购意大利前伊娃工厂
item.description: 据 Il Sole 24 Ore 周六报道，新日本制铁公司可能有意收购陷入困境的意大利钢铁厂（前身为 Ilva），但未说明消息来源。【原文：Nippon Steel may be interested in buying the troubled Italian steel plant formerly known as Ilva, Il Sole 24 Ore reported on Saturday, without saying where it got the information.】

item.title: 据说 LG 将为其印度子公司 15 亿美元的上市挑选银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，韩国 LG 电子公司已为其印度业务的潜在首次公开募股挑选了银行，此次募股可能筹集多达 15 亿美元的资金。【原文：South Korea’s LG Electronics Inc. has picked banks for a potential initial public offering of its Indian business that could raise as much as $1.5 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 伊朗将 "查姆兰 1 号 "研究卫星送入太空：国家电视台
item.description: 据伊朗伊斯兰共和国国家电视网报道，伊朗周六向太空发射了一颗国产研究卫星。【原文：Iran launched a domestically-manufactured research satellite into space on Saturday, according to the Islamic Republic’s state television network.】

item.title: 欧洲股市领头羊正在褪色，这对未来回报是个坏兆头
item.description: 在经济增长放缓和中国紧张局势的担忧考验投资者信心之际，欧洲股市两年来上涨背后的引擎正在失去动力，使该地区股市面临空虚。【原文：The engines behind two years of European stock gains are losing power, leaving the region’s equities facing a void at a time when concerns over slowing growth and China tensions are testing investor confidence.】

item.title: 德国在连续两周的坏消息中挣扎
item.description: 德国艰难地渡过了 Covid-19 大流行病的难关，并在俄罗斯切断天然气供应后成功避免了毁灭性的工业停产。尽管如此，德国从未完全消除人们对未来可能出现经济问题的担忧。过去两周的戏剧性事件证明，这些担忧是有道理的。【原文：Germany muscled its way through the Covid-19 pandemic and managed to avoid a devastating industrial shutdown after Russia cut off its gas supplies. Still, it never fully allayed concerns that economic trouble might lie ahead. The past two weeks provided dramatic evidence that these fears were justified.】

item.title: 中国钢铁危机导致 8 月产量降至 2017 年以来最低点
item.description: 8 月份，中国钢铁产量比去年同期下降了 10%以上，原因是该行业受到了低价格和破坏性需求下滑的影响。【原文：China’s steel production fell by more than 10% from a year earlier in August as the industry reeled from low prices and a damaging slump in demand.】

item.title: 刺激效应减弱，中国房价加速下跌
item.description: 8 月份，中国房价下跌速度略有加快，凸显出最新住房救助计划的效果正在减弱。【原文：China’s home prices fell at a slightly faster pace in August, underscoring the waning effect of the latest housing rescue plan.】

item.title: 全球股市涨势扩大，小型市场抢尽风头
item.description: 在今年大部分时间被投资者冷落之后，一些小型股票市场突然赢得了青睐。【原文：After being sidelined by investors for much of this year, some smaller equity markets are suddenly winning favor.】

item.title: 前广告主管称 Facebook 也无法与谷歌竞争
item.description: 一位前 Facebook 广告高管在美国司法部的反垄断审判中作证说，Meta Platforms 公司在内部得出结论认为，由于谷歌垄断了在线展示广告的基础技术，它无法成功地与搜索巨头竞争，因此在 2018 年与谷歌达成了协议。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. entered into a 2018 deal with Google after concluding internally that it couldn’t successfully compete against the search giant, because of its monopoly over the technology undergirding online display advertising, a former Facebook advertising executive testified as part of a US Justice Department antitrust trial.】

item.title: DirecTV 和 Dish 就合并卫星电视业务再次进行谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，AT&T 公司和合资伙伴 TPG 公司正在洽谈将其 DirecTV 服务与 Dish 合并的事宜。【原文：AT&T Inc. and joint-venture partner TPG Inc. are in talks to combine their DirecTV service with Dish, according to people familiar with the matter, a deal that could create the largest pay-TV provider in the US.】

item.title: 前杰富瑞基金经理因涉嫌欺诈面临刑事调查
item.description: 杰富瑞金融集团（Jefferies Financial Group）的一名前对冲基金经理因涉嫌从基金中骗取超过 1 亿美元而被起诉，目前也面临联邦刑事调查。【原文：A former Jefferies Financial Group hedge fund manager who was sued for allegedly defrauding the fund out of more than $100 million is also facing a federal criminal probe.】

item.title: 英特尔斥资 35 亿美元为军方生产芯片
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，英特尔公司已正式获得高达 35 亿美元的联邦拨款，为五角大楼生产半导体，此前该芯片制造商与美国官员达成了一项具有约束力的协议。【原文：Intel Corp. has officially qualified for as much as $3.5 billion in federal grants to make semiconductors for the Pentagon, according to people familiar with the matter, after the chipmaker reached a binding agreement with US officials.】

item.title: 山姆-班克曼-弗里德要求重审，指责联邦法官对他的嘲弄
item.description: 被监禁的 FTX 联合创始人山姆-班克曼-弗里德（Sam Bankman-Fried）要求重新审判，指责联邦法官阻止他进行适当辩护。【原文：Jailed FTX co-founder Sam Bankman-Fried is asking for a new trial, blaming a federal judge for preventing him from mounting a proper defense.】

item.title: 华尔街拒绝戒除风险瘾，大举押注美联储
item.description: 华尔街的冒险大军一次又一次地对美联储的政策阴谋和债券市场不断变化的经济情绪充耳不闻。【原文：Time and again, Wall Street’s risk-taking brigade has turned a deaf ear to Federal Reserve policy machinations and shifting economic sentiment in the bond market.】

item.title: 推特支持者阿利雅加入约翰-特雷泽尔竞购埃弗顿俱乐部的行列
item.description: Aliya Capital Partners 正在支持美国投资者 John Textor 收购埃弗顿足球俱乐部。【原文：Aliya Capital Partners is backing US investor John Textor’s bid to acquire Everton FC, the historic English football club that’s struggling to find a buyer.】

item.title: 意大利考虑限制 Fnac Darty 竞购电子连锁企业
item.description: 意大利政府正在考虑限制法国零售商 Fnac Darty SA 收购该国最大的电子产品连锁店之一，原因是担心涉及数百万客户的敏感数据。【原文：The Italian government is considering restrictions on French retailer Fnac Darty SA’s offer for one of the country’s largest electronics chains over concerns about sensitive data on millions of customers, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: Wamco 将失去为罗素战略债券基金管理资金的工作
item.description: Western Asset Management Co. 披露明星交易员肯-利奇（Ken Leech）面临联邦调查后，投资者纷纷撤离，该公司因此失去了罗素投资管理公司（Russell Investment Management）旗下基金的副顾问资格。【原文：Western Asset Management Co., stung by an investor exodus after disclosing that star trader Ken Leech faces a federal investigation, is now losing its role as a subadviser to a Russell Investment Management fund.】

item.title: 白宫通过贸易修复计划瞄准中国零售商
item.description: 拜登政府正着手缩小一个贸易漏洞，Shein 和 Temu 等中国在线零售商利用这个漏洞每天向美国运送大量廉价商品。【原文：The Biden administration is moving to narrow a trade loophole that Chinese online retailers like Shein and Temu have used to ship a torrent of packages containing cheap goods into the US every day.】

item.title: 纽约文华东方酒店开发商为未售出公寓获得贷款
item.description: 位于纽约第五大道的文华东方公寓的开发商获得了一笔存货贷款，以帮助支付该大楼未售出的豪华公寓的成本。【原文：Developers of the Mandarin Oriental residences on New York’s Fifth Avenue secured an inventory loan to help with the cost of unsold luxury condos at the building.】

item.title: 费城艺术学院在令人震惊的关闭后申请破产
item.description: 艺术大学是费城的一所私立大学，今年 6 月突然关闭，在债券持有人要求其立即偿还 5000 多万美元债务两周后，艺术大学于周五申请破产。【原文：The University of the Arts, the private college in Philadelphia that abruptly closed its doors in June, filed bankruptcy Friday, two weeks after it faced a demand by its bondholders for immediate repayment of more than $50 million in debt.】

item.title: 特朗普表示 "我不卖 "后，特朗普媒体股价飙升
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周五表示，他 "绝对无意 "在下周晚些时候锁定期到期时出售所持股份，这使得他的社交媒体初创公司股价飙升。【原文：Donald Trump sent shares of his social media startup soaring Friday after he said he has “absolutely no intention of selling” his stake when a lockup period is set to expire late next week.】

item.title: 对冲基金从未如此看空布伦特原油
item.description: 由于担心石油供应过剩，对冲基金有史以来首次对布伦特原油转为净看跌。【原文：Hedge funds turned net bearish on Brent crude for the first time on record as concerns about an oversupply of oil hammer futures prices.】

item.title: 特朗普表示不会出售其持有的特朗普媒体集团股份
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在新闻发布会上表示，他不想出售他持有的特朗普传媒科技集团公司（Trump Media & Technology Group Corp.【原文：Donald Trump says he doesn’t want to sell his Trump Media & Technology Group Corp. shares and that he doesn’t need the money, in remarks at a press conference.】

item.title: 阿波罗的私人信贷 ETF 有多 "私人"？
item.description:
该公司正与道富联手拟成立基金

。【原文：

The firm is teaming up with State Street on the proposed fund

】

item.title: 巴西从马斯克公司撤资 330 万美元
item.description: 巴西从埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 公司和 Starlink 公司的银行账户中提取了 1835 万雷亚尔（约合 330 万美元），用于支付最高法院的罚款。【原文：Brazil withdrew 18.35 million reais ($3.3 million) from the bank accounts of Elon Musk’s X and Starlink to pay for fines imposed by the Supreme Court, continuing a dispute that’s led to the blackout of the billionaire’s social-media service in the country.】
